subject: Re: [junit] how to read JUnit report programatically
msgSnippet: gaurangnshah, The simplest solution may be to look at using ant to run and report on your tests. David Saff
messageBody:
gaurangnshah,

The simplest solution may be to look at using ant to run and report on
your tests.

David Saff

On Thu, Nov 18, 2010 at 7:07 AM, gaurangnshah <gaurangnshah@...> wrote:
> Hi all,
>
> I want to send the mail to client after the test suit run. So is there any way i can come to know how many test cases have passed and how many testcases have failed programatically??
>
